Razor Claw released his sword glaring at Optimus Prime and Eclipse. He tran=
sformed to Raptor to even the odds if necessary. "You ran from a battle whi=
le other Maximals risked both spark and limb to protect it." The angry Rapt=
or wan't in his right mind, he was suffering an imbalance brought on by Ver=
atis' virus. His thoughts were one sided and could only see his form of rea=
son. 

He was the mighty raptor and these four were no more than lowly prey=
 to be consumed. it didn't matter if he believed thier story. The desertion=
 was merely an excuse to lash out and look tough. Lash out he did swinging =
his powerful tail at Optimus, slashin a claw from his left foot at Eclipse =
and snapping his jaws at Wolveritron.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, February 05, 200=
1 8:19 AM
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


  ::Optimus Prime/Eclip=
se/Wolveritron/Ramus::
   
      Optimus Prime reached out and grabbed the =
sword, just holding it there.
      "There will be no bloodshed today," Pri=
me said. "Whatever these bots did, I'm sure they have their reasons. Please=
 allow them to explain."
      Eclipse looked at the bot and shifted to his=
 most powerful form, the Werewolf. "We left the Cybertronian Fire because o=
ur work will not benifit if I am destroyed. The Alliance was coming dangero=
udly close to destroying the CF. I had to get out. I am now returning to th=
e CF, with Optimus Prime, here."
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From=
: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, February 05=
, 2001 11:51 AM
    Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    Razor Claw =
stood unmoving, staring Wolveritron down.

    "You don't fight back?" he g=
lared at the deserter HOPING FOR A RESPONSE.

    "You do not fight then yo=
u admit your guilt." he drew his sword and swung it in a backslashing motio=
n at a level to decapitate Wolveritron.


      ----- Original Message ----=
- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Th=
ursday, February 01, 2001 9:31 PM
      Subject: Re: Dachande respond or el=
se


      Razor Claw stands up straight, looking toward Prime. "Stay out o=
f this, you are not part of the accused or a viable witness so you have no =
say in what happens to these deserters."

      The mutant wasn't exactly w=
hat bots would consider sane. he was injected with a virus to stabilize his=
 double transformation but was only given one sequence to key upon. Maybe i=
t was the virus, maybe it was his injuries, or maybe the former Pred was ju=
st sickened by bots who'd run from a battle and leave thier comrades to suf=
fer the pains of battle.

      "Now for business I was dealing with you!" =
he reached out and poked Wolveritron in the chestplate trying to pursue his=
 issues.


        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: dachande 
  =
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001=
 1:57 PM
        Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


        ::Optimus =
Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
         
            They had not heard =
Razor Claw ask them to stop, but they heard him the second time. Prime was =
walking away, but he stopped and came back.
            "Is there something=
 you need from us?" Prime asked.
          ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          S=
ent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 10:22 AM
          Subject: Re: Dachande r=
espond or else


          It all started back when...


             -----=
 Original Message ----- 
            From: dachande 
            To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
            Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
         =
   Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


            ::Eclipse/Wolveri=
tron/Ramus::
             
                They had heard the battling and =
decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolve=
ritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exited the bas=
e, in beast modes. And headed far away

            So I responded with...
=
            . 
            Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen =
of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentally r=
eported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three until =
they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled=
 his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to, yo=
ur choice."

            Then a few more posts of Razor Claw tracking them =
until finally Optimus Prime (Razor Claw doesn't know enough about Prime to =
recognise him) Wolveritron, Ramus, and Eclipse were finally together. and R=
azor Claw caught up with them.(I can't find the cave posting I thought it w=
as those three that were in the same cave as Vuloise.)

            He apro=
ached the three bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended=
 peacefully









          Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
                
    =
            www.
